Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Client.ClientTCP

Class ClientTCP

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Client.ClientTCP.ClientTCP
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientInterface, ConfigurableClient, GameManagementInterface, NetworkManagementInterface
public class ClientTCP extends Object implements ClientInterface
This class represents the "network interface" of clients that use TCP for network communication.

    • send

      private boolean send(MessageToServer message)
      This method is used to send a message to the server using TCP.
      Parameters:
      message - the MessageToServer to be sent
      Returns:
      true if and only if message has been sent correctly (e.g. no IOException occurred during the sending)

      This method is used by thread responsible for sending messages to server.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(MessageToServer message)
      This method is used to add a new MessageToServer to the queue of messages that have to be sent to server.
      Parameters:
      message - the MessageToServer that have to be sent to server.

    • finalizeSending

      private void finalizeSending() throws IOException
      This method is used to finalize the message sending: it flushes and reset ObjectOutputStream.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurred while performing the action

    • receiveMessages

      private void receiveMessages()
      This method is used to receive messages from the network and dispatch to the correct class (MessageHandler or HeartBeatManager)

    • stopClient

      public void stopClient()
      This method is used to stop client. First, it shuts down HeartBeatManager, then clears messages to send queue, interrupts both receiver and sender thread and closes socket
      Specified by:
      stopClient in interface NetworkManagementInterface

      Parameters:
      gameName - the name of the game that will be created.

      Parameters:

      numPlayers - the number of players for the game.

    • logoutFromGame

      public void logoutFromGame() throws RuntimeException
      This method is used to ask server to logout from the game player is currently registered to. It clears, also, all the messages haven't been sent.
      Specified by:
      logoutFromGame in interface GameManagementInterface
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs while performing the requested action

    • reconnect

      public void reconnect() throws IllegalStateException
      This method is used when client has to reconnect to server. It works in all situations, including rebooting the machine.
      Specified by:
      reconnect in interface NetworkManagementInterface
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - when an error happened managing configuration

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect() throws RuntimeException
      This method is used when client need to disconnect from server. It sends DisconnectMessage.
      Specified by:
      disconnect in interface NetworkManagementInterface
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs while trying to perform the requested action

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(String cardToInsert, String anchorCard, Direction directionToInsert, CardOrientation orientation)
      This method is used to send a PlaceCardMessage to server.
      Specified by:
      placeCard in interface GameManagementInterface
      Parameters:
      cardToInsert - the card that needs to be placed.
      anchorCard - the card from which to place the card.
      directionToInsert - the direction from the anchorCard in which player wants to place the card.
      orientation - the orientation in which player wants to place cardToInsert.

      Specified by:
      sendChatMessage in interface GameManagementInterface
      Parameters:
      usersToSend - a list containing the nickname of the users to whom player wants to send the message.
      messageToSend - the message we want to send.
